org.trianacode.gui.main.imp

Class TrianaToolLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.main.imp.TrianaToolLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.LayoutManager

    public class TrianaToolLayout
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.LayoutManager
    The layout for a triana tool. This places the input/output nodes and plus/ minus signs in their correct places.
